Title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
Overview: Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit enjoying his quiet life, is swept into an epic quest by Gandalf the Grey and thirteen dwarves who seek to reclaim their mountain home from Smaug, the dragon.
Tagline: From the smallest beginnings come the greatest legends.
Keywords: riddle, elves, dwarves, orcs, middle-earth (tolkien), hobbit, mountains, wizard, journey, ring, goblin, courage, giant, tunnel, underground lake, buried treasure, climbing a tree, invisibility, ancient, gnomes
production_companies: WingNut Films, New Line Cinema, Warner Bros. Pictures, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer (MGM)
Cast: Ian McKellen, Martin Freeman, Richard Armitage
